thread.title: 5 simple ways to grow long and healthy eyelashes naturally
thread.title_full: 5 simple ways to grow long and healthy eyelashes naturally

title: 5 simple ways to grow long and healthy eyelashes naturally
text:
Aashna Malani, Hindustan Times , New Delhi | Updated: Jul 13, 2015 16:03 IST Try these simple tricks at home and get luscious eyelashes that your friends will envy. (Shutterstock) 
Want those fluttery, Barbie-like lashes? Why rely on troublesome extension or harmful chemicals when you can go natural? Here are easy ways: 
1 Olive Oil: 
It is rich in the required vitamins and minerals. Dip a cotton swab in some olive oil and apply it gently on the eyelashes every night before hitting the bed. 
2 Castor Oil and Vitamin E potion: 
Castor oil is thick in density, so mix it with a light oil like Vitamin-E, and then apply for a smoother application. It boosts blood circulation within the hair follicles and helps in growth. 
3 Green Tea: It contains caffeine and flavonoids which help in strengthening your eye lashes.They also boost new growth too. Soak a cotton ball in freshly steeped green tea and gently swipe it on your lashes. 
4 Lemon peels soaked in olive oil: Soak dried lemon peels in olive oil for 4-5 days. Applying this oil infused with the goodness of vitamin-C makes lashes long and strong. 
5 Wipe away makeup: Wash it off or use a mild wet wipe. Soaked in toners, they come in variants like aloe vera, rose and eucalyptus. 
Inputs by beauty expert Bharti Taneja Tags
